content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information on job openings in specific cities or industries. However, you can search for job openings in the industrial automation field in your city by checking online job boards such as Indeed, Monster, or Glassdoor. You can also research the industrial automation companies in your city and check their websites for career opportunities. Network with professionals in the field by attending industry events, joining professional associations, or outreach through social media to get an idea of the current industrial automation job market in your city.
